ModMetaData.name: Dreamer's Dreams
ModMetaData.author: Iwo Rosiak
ModMetaData.description:
Thank you for downloading my mod! You are amazing!
To report any issues please refer to the mod page which I check every minute : )
<size=22>Notes:</size> - Doesn't require a new save
<size=22>Features:</size> - Pawns will dream while they rest. - Pawns with the sleepwalker trait will occassionally sleepwalk, causing a bit of disturbances among the colony... - Dreams depend on personality. For example, cannibals will have more unique dreams than a normal colonist... - Mod settings that allow you to customise your experience.
<size=22>Propose a dream!</size> Tell us about your favourite dreams (from your life :> ) and I will try to implement it into the mod :D
<size=22>Happy Dreaming...</size>
